scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:env && delay 7 && npm run deploy
scripts.build: node ops/generate-abis.js && node ops/generate-schema.js && node ops/generate-subgraph.js && node ops/graph-codegen.js
scripts.migrate: npm explore dynamic-datasource-test-protocol -- npm run migrate
scripts.postinstall: npm explore dynamic-datasource-test-protocol -- npm run build
